segments.text: I see the woman in the kitchen, absorbed in her task of drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the plate seems so intense, it's almost as if the rest of the world has faded away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I notice the water pouring over the sink's edge, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see it? The water is pooling dangerously close to her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos contrasts sharply with the peaceful garden visible through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ironic how calm everything outside appears, while chaos brews inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wonder if she will eventually notice the mess she's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR
